docs.lead_paragraph: Retirement accounts, charitable gifts and taxes faced by retirees on Medicare are all in dispute on Capitol Hill.

headline.seo: A Guide to Navigating the Shifting Tax Landscape in 2010

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Robert A. King and Dr. James F. Leckman of the Yale School of Medicine recently joined the Consults blog to answer readers' questions about Tourette's syndrome, a mysterious ailment that causes odd tics, sudden jerking movements and strange vocalizations. Here, Dr. Leckman and Dr. King respond to readers asking about medications, psychotherapy and experimental treatments for Tourette's.

headline.main: Easing the Tics of Tourette's Syndrome

docs.abstract: Dr. Robert King and Dr. James Leckman from the Yale Child Study Center discuss treatments for Tourette's syndrome.
docs.snippet: Dr. Robert King and Dr. James Leckman from the Yale Child Study Center discuss treatments for Tourette's syndrome.
